Paṅga，[?] only in cpd．paṅgacīra （nt．） at D．I，6 “blowing through toy pipes made of leaves” （Dial．I．10，where is cpd．Sinhalese pat-kulal and Marathī pungī after Morris J．P．T．S．1889，205）．Bdhgh explns as “p．vuccati paṇṇa-nāḷikā； taṁ dhamantā kīḷanti” DA．I，86．（Page 382）
